alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Karnes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 1:55PM CDT until April 09 at 4:32PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... San Antonio River at Hwy 72 near Runge affecting Goliad and Karnes Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 35.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:15 PM CDT Saturday was 35.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 12.6 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 36.4 feet on 06/05/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue San Antonio River Hwy 72 nr Runge 27.0 35.7 Sat 1 pm CDT 20.6 16.2 13.6 &&
info.instruction: This warning will be in effect until the river falls below its flood stage. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening around 915 PM CDT.
